name: Skins Skunk
description: This 60% indica-dominant hybrid from Loud Seeds is a result of years of work that started by pollinating an elite clone-only Afgoo found in Sonoma with a male Michigan Skunk. Selected and bred to the f4 generation, Skins Skunk produces generous yields of hashy smelling flowers with THC levels ranging from 17% to 21% and CBD levels up to 2%.
attributes_title: Euphoric, Giggly, Happy, Hungry, Relaxed, Cramps, Pain, Muscle Spasms, Stress, Depression
